quest.name: Here Comes the Sun
journal:
 Quest Sync
Verpaulaine is chuffed that you're helping him.

After briefly explaining the artificial sun's inner workings, Verpaulaine bids you accompany him on a visit to Phoibos. You make your way to Logistikon Alpha so you can head to the Medial Circuit.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

Thanks to your mature comportment, you and Verpaulaine successfully enter the Medial Circuit. The boy dashes off immediately, rather defeating the point of your accompanying him, but you turn toward Phoibos nevertheless.

Upon your catching up with him at Phoibos, Verpaulaine asks that you wait while he examines the facility for any issues. Though the Lalafell stationed at Phoibos says nothing, there is the distinct sense that he will be keeping a close eye on the youth during their tour.

Verpaulaine reports that he was unable to find anything amiss. However, the youth remains confident that the problem exists, and its cause simply lies elsewhere. You have little choice but to agree to accompany him as he searches for it.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: I'm ready to go if you are!

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: Oh, I suppose I should tell you a bit about the artificial sun first. It's got an engine called a “reactor” that burns with fire aether.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: My theory is that the reactor has too much aether now, and that's what's changed its color.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: Ergo, we should go to Phoibos. I know someone who works there helping to control the artificial sun. I bet he'll let us have a look around!

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: It's in the Medial Circuit, so we should head for Logistikon Alpha first. Follow me so you don't get lost.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: They don't usually let me into the Medial Circuit, but having you here changes everything!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Are you ready to enter the Medial Circuit with Verpaulaine?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: VADELOISON
dialogue.text: Hello again, Verpaulaine. You and your friend are free to go through.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: You have my thanks. It's so tiresome, having your freedoms limited because of your age...

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: Anyway, let's make our way to Phoibos.

dialogue.name: PHOIBOSSTAFF
dialogue.text: Oh, hello. Are you here to have a look around? I must emphasize that touching the buttons within, however tempting, is not permitted.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: He said I can go and have a look! Wait here─I'll let you know if I find anything.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: Well, he showed me the control panel, but there didn't seem to be anything wrong.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: The reactor's records didn't contain anything worth noting either.

dialogue.name: PHOIBOSSTAFF
dialogue.text: That's what you were worried about, eh? You do realize this place has been around as long as Labyrinthos and we've never had a single problem.

dialogue.name: PHOIBOSSTAFF
dialogue.text: Nor have we been able to confirm this change in the light's hue you speak of. Are you certain you didn't just stare at the sun too long? We advise against that for a reason, you know.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: They can talk down to me all they want, but I know what I saw.

dialogue.name: VERPAULAINE
dialogue.text: If there's nothing wrong here then it simply means the root of the problem lies elsewhere. Let's go!
